backend/main.mo: Actor implementing registrant, profile, and badge management with access control, including CRUD operations and search with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping wallet navigation and configuration features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing steps for deploying to the Internet Computer, verifying canister IDs, and configuring optional environment variables.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the frontend root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application setup configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app with theming and layout components.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing navigation, wallet link, user badge display, global mismatch warnings, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication control component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentInfo.t: Popover UI that displays deployment diagnostics, canister mismatch warnings, and copyable deployment values.
frontend/src/components/OisyWalletNavIte: Navigation item that conditionally links to the Oisy Wallet based on authentication and configuration state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/world/PlanetWorl: Three.js scene rendering a rotating planet with animated inhabitants positioned via utility functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller’s profile, role, and admin status, combining them into a current user state object.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for saving user profiles, managing registrants, and fetching counts via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBadge.ts: Provides a query hook that retrieves or creates the current user's badge using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable list of registrants with admin delete support.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Shows a coming‑soon events page outlining completed and upcoming Web3 steps.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with onboarding messaging, hero section, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Implements the user registration form, loading existing data, validating fields, and saving registrants.
frontend/src/pages/WorldPage.tsx: Renders the Digital World page, showing a 3D planet with inhabitant count and handling auth, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentInfo.ts: Provides deployment info by combining env vars with runtime inference and detects canister/network mismatches.
frontend/src/utils/oisyWallet.ts: Fetches the OISY wallet URL from env vars and exposes a check for whether it is configured.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/worldPlacement.ts: Generates deterministic 3D positions and colors for inhabitants on a sphere using golden-angle distribution.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Contains metadata about project goals, features, issues, and current build/deployment state.
